ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ الْإِنسَنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ
en: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop -
then at once he is a clear adversary?
And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation.

ar: قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ الْعِظَمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ
en: He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"

ar: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا الَّذِى أَنشَأَهَا أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ
en: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time;
and He is, of all creation, Knowing."

ar: الَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ الشَّجَرِ الْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا
en: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire,
and then from it you ignite.
Is not He who created the heavens and the earth
Able to create the likes of them?
Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.
His command is only when He intends a thing

ar: إِذَا أَرَادَ شَئًْا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُ
en: when He intends a thing that He says to it,

ar: فَسُبْحَنَ الَّذِى بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ
en: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things,

ar: فَسُبْحَنَ الَّذِى بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ
en: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things,
and to Him you will be returned.
